maqras.text: na mumkin hai ke kisi bandhe se Allah ta’ala kalaam kare, magar wahi ke zariye ya pardeh ke piche se ya kisi farishte ko bheje aur wo Allah ke hukm se jo wo chaahe wahi kare, beshak wo bartar hai hikmath waala hai

aur isi tarah hum ne aap ki taraf apne hukm se ruh ko utaara hai, aap us se pehle ye bhi nahi jaante thein ke kitaab aur imaan kya cheez hai? lekin hum ne ose noor banaya, us ke zariye se apne bandho mein se jise chaahte hai hidaayath dete hai, beshak aap raahe raasth ki rehnumaayi kar rahe hai
us Allah ki raah ki jis ki milkiyath mein asmaano aur zameen ki har cheez hai, agaah raho, sab kaam Allah ta’ala hee ki taraf lauthte hai
haa meeem
qasam hai is waazeh kitaab ki
hum ne is ko arabi zabaan ka Qur’aan banaya hai ke tum samajh lo
yaqinan ye lauhe mehfooz mein hai aur hamaare nazdeek bulandh martaba hikmath waali hai
kya hum is nasihath ko tum se is bina par hata le ke tum hadh se guzar jaane waale log ho
aur hum ne agle logo mein bhi kitne hee nabi bheje
jo nabi un ke paas aaya unhone us ka mazaaq udaaya
pas hum ne un se zyaada zoor aawaro ko tabaah kar daala aur aglo ki misaal guzar chuki hai
agar aap un se daryaaft kare ke asmaano aur zameen ko kis ne payda kiya to yaqinan un ka jawaab yahi hoga ke unhe ghaalib wa daana (Allah) ne hee payda kiya hai
wahi hai jis ne tumhaare liye zameen ko farsh (bichona) banaya aur us mein tumhaare liye raaste kar diye, ta ke tum raah pa liya karo
osi ne asmaan se ek andaaze ke mutaabiq paani naazil farmaya, pas hum ne us se murda shahar ko zinda kar diya, isi tarah tum nikaale jaoge
jis ne tamaam chizo ke jode banaaye aur tumhaare liye kashtiyaa banayi aur chau paaye jaanwar (payda kiye) jin par tum sawaar hote ho

ta ke tum un ki peet par jam kar sawaar hoa karo phir apne rab ki nemath ko yaadh karo, jab us par theek thaak baith jaao, aur kaho paak zaath hai us ki jis ne ise hamaare bas mein kar diya, halaan ke hamein ise qaabo karne ki taaqath na thi
aur bil yaqeen hum apne rab ki taraf laut kar jaane waale hai
aur unhone Allah ke baaz bandho ko us ka juz tehra diya, yaqinan insaan khullam khulla na shukra hai
kya Allah ta’ala ne apni maqlooq mein se betiyaa to khud rakh li aur tumhe beto se nawaaza
(halaan ke) un mein se kisi ko jab us cheez ki qabar di jaaye jis ki misaal us ne (Allah) rahmaan ke liye bayaan ki hai, to us ka chehra siyaah pad jaata hai aur wo ghamgeen ho jaata hai
kya (Allah ki aulaad ladkiya hai) jo zewraath mein pali aur jhagde mein (apni baath) waazeh na kar sa ke

aur unhone farishto ko jo rahmaan ke ibaadat guzaar hai aurte qaraar de liya, kya un ki padayish ke mauqe par ye maujoodh thein? un ki ye gawaahi likh li jayegi aur un se (is cheez ki) baaz purs ki jayegi
aur kehte hai agar Allah chahta to hum un ki ibaadath na karte, unhe us ki kuch qabar nahi, ye to sirf atkal piccho (jhoot baatein) kehte hai
kya hum ne unhe is se pehle koyi (aur) kitaab di hai jise ye mazbooth thaame hoye hai
(nahi nahi) balke ye to kehte hai ke hum ne apne baap dada ko ek maz’hab par paaya, aur hum un hee ke naqsh khadam par chal kar raah yaafta hai

isi tarah aap se pehle bhi hum ne jis basti mein koyi daraane waala bheja, wahaa ke aasuda haal logo ne yahi jawaab diya ke hum ne apne baap dada ko (ek raah par) aur ek deen par paaya aur hum to unhee ke naqshe pa ki pairvi karne waale hai
